IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: HELPS TO ENHANCE THE INDEPENDENCE, THUS ENRICHING AND CHANGING THE LIVES OF INDIVIDUALS WITH PHYSICAL AND AGE RELATED DISABILITIES, THROUGH CARE AND SUPPORT SERVICES.
IRS990.MissionDesc: HELPS TO ENHANCE THE INDEPENDENCE, THUS ENRICHING AND CHANGING THE LIVES OF INDIVIDUALS WITH PHYSICAL AND AGE RELATED DISABILITIES, THROUGH CARE AND SUPPORT SERVICES.
IRS990.Desc: SUPPORTS COORDINATION - COORDINATING SERVICES FOR INDIVIDUALS WITH PHYSICAL OR AGE RELATED DISABILITIES WHO ARE RECEIVING SERVICES IN THEIR HOME.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: HOME MODIFICATIONS - CREATING ACCESSIBLE HOUSING FOR INDIVIDUALS WITH DISABILITIES AND THE ELDERLY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: CUSTOM WHEELCHAIR SEATING - CREATING CUSTOM SEATING SYSTEMS FOR INDIVIDUALS WITH UNIQUE PHYSICAL NEEDS.

ProgSrvcAccomActyOtherGrp.Desc: SERVICE DOGS - PROVIDING TRAINED DOGS TO PEOPLE WHO HAVE A MOBILITY DISABILITY IN ORDER TO LIVE FULLER LIVES.
TRANSITION SCHOOL - PROVIDING HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS, WITH A VARIETY OF DISABILITIES, INDEPENDENT LIVING SKILLS.
EMPLOYMENT SERVICES - DESIGNED TO MEET THE NEEDS OF LOCAL EMPLOYERS AND INDIVIDUALS WITH DISABILITIES.
RECREATIONAL PROGRAMS - CREATING OPPORTUNITIES FOR INDIVIDUALS WITH DISABILITIES TO GATHER AND HAVE FUN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: UNITED DISABILITIES SERVICES IS INCORPORATED UNDER THE LAWS OF THE COMMONWEALTH OF PENNSYLVANIA AS NON-PROFIT ENTITY. SINCE IT IS EXEMPT FROM TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES IS MADE FOR ACTIVITIES RELATED TO THE ORGANIZATION'S EXEMPT PURPOSE. MANAGEMENT HAS EVALUATED ITS TAX FILINGS FOR UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS. TAX RETURNS ARE OPEN FOR EXAMINATION BY THE INTERNAL REVENUE SERVICE FOR THREE YEARS FROM THE DUE DATE OF THE RETURNS OR DATE FILED (WHICHEVER IS LATER) AND ARE OPEN FOR EXAMINATION BY THE STATE FOR AN UNLIMITED PERIOD OF TIME.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MANAGEMENT SERVICES WERE PROVIDED BY NON-PROFIT MANAGEMENT SOLUTIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: UNITED DISABILITIES SERVICES FOUNDATION (FOUNDATION) IS THE SOLE MEMBER OF UNITED DISABILITIES SERVICES (UDS). AS SOLE MEMBER, THE FOUNDATION HAS SIGNIFICANT RIGHTS AS DESCRIBED BELOW.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION, AS SOLE MEMBER OF UDS, MAY APPOINT AND REMOVE ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF UDS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: UNITED DISABILITIES SERVICES FOUNDATION, AS SOLE MEMBER OF UDS, HAS THE POWER: (A)TO AMEND UDS' ARTICLES OR BYLAWS; (B)TO PURCHASE, SELL, LEASE OR ENCUMBER WITH DEBT IN ANY WAY REAL PROPERTY OF UDS, OR TO CREATE ANY ENCUMBRANCE UPON OR EXECUTE ANY DEBT INSTRUMENT AFFECTING OR RESTRICTING ANY ASSET OF UDS IN EXCESS OF AN AMOUNT SPECIFIED FROM TIME TO TIME BY RESOLUTION OF THE SOLE MEMBER, AND IN EXCESS OF THE ANNUAL CAPITAL AND OPERATING BUDGETS OF UDS; (C)TO TRANSFER ANY ASSETS OF UDS NOT IN THE ORDINARY COURSE OF BUSINESS IF THE AMOUNT INVOLVED IN ANY SUCH TRANSACTION IS IN EXCESS OF AN AMOUNT SPECIFIED FROM TIME TO TIME BY RESOLUTION OF THE SOLE MEMBER; (D)TO APPROVE NON-BUDGETED EXPENDITURES BY UDS OF SUCH AMOUNTS SPECIFIED FROM TIME TO TIME BY THE SOLE MEMBER; (E)TO APPROVE THE ANNUAL OPERATING AND CAPITAL BUDGETS OF UDS; (F)TO APPOINT AND REMOVE ALL MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF UDS; (G)TO APPROVE THE SELECTION OF THE PRESIDENT, THE APPROVAL OF WHICH SHALL NOT BE UNREASONABLY WITHHELD; (H)TO APPROVE, BEFORE IT MAY BECOME EFFECTIVE, THE CREATION OF ANY TAXABLE OR TAX-EXEMPT SUBSIDIARY ORGANIZATION OF UDS; AND (I)TO APPROVE INVESTMENT ADVISORS, MANAGERS, OUTSIDE LEGAL COUNSEL, AND AUDITORS OF UDS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: FORM 990 IS DISCUSSED AT THE UDSF EXECUTIVE AND FINANCE COMMITTEE MEETINGS FOR MEMBERS' REVIEW AND COMMENT. IN ADDITION, THE FORM IS ELECTRONICALLY MADE AVAILABLE FOR DISTRIBUTION TO THE ENTIRE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANY BOARD MEMBER SIGNS A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT DISCLOSING ANY CONFLICTS. ALSO, CONFLICT OF INTEREST IS DISCUSSED DURING THE ANNUAL BOARD MEETING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: UDSF HAS A FORMAL EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION PROCESS. UDSF COMPLETES AN EXECUTIVE COMPENSATION STUDY BY SELECTING AN OUTSIDE, INDEPENDENT ADVISOR. THE ADVISOR WORKS WITH OUR SENIOR LEADERSHIP TEAM AND OUR BOARD OF DIRECTORS TO REVIEW JOB DESCRIPTIONS, ORGANIZATION BACKGROUND AND FUTURE STRATEGY AND FINANCIAL INFORMATION. THE ADVISOR CONDUCTS A MARKET ANALYSIS BY SOLICITING MULTIPLE SURVEY SOURCES AND VIEWING DATA BY INDUSTRY SEGMENT, NON-PROFIT SEGMENTS, REGIONAL SCOPE AND SIMILAR REVENUE SIZE. THE ADVISOR PRESENTS FINDINGS AND RECOMMENDATIONS TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE UDSF BOARD. UDSF ALSO HAS A FORMAL DIRECTOR-LEVEL COMPENSATION PROCESS. IT IS THE SAME PROCESS AS THE EXECUTIVE PROCESS. HOWEVER, THE FINDINGS ARE PRESENTED TO AND APPROVED BY THE SENIOR LEADERSHIP TEAM AND HUMAN RESOURCES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PROCESS HAS NOT CHANGED FROM THE PRIOR YEAR, AND IS GOVERNED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: RAISES FUNDS FOR RELATED NONPROFIT ENTITIES
PROVIDES SERVICES TO OTHER NONPROFIT ENTITIES
ADVANCES THE INDEPENDENCE OF THE ELDERLY AND PEOPLE WITH DISABILITIES

IdRelatedOrgTxblCorpTrGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: HOME CARE SERVICES FOR THE DISABLED AND ELDERLY
SALE AND RENTAL OF HOME MEDICAL EQUIPMENT
